briefTitle: Clinical Performance of a Chlorhexidine Antimicrobial Dressing
officialTitle: Clinical Performance of a Chlorhexidine Antimicrobial Dressing

interventions.name: Transparent Adhesive Dressing
otherNames: TAD, Polyurethane Dressing, Transparent Membrane Dressing

summary: Evaluate the clinical performance of a new IV Dressing in Comparison to a standard IV Dressing

primaryOutcome.measure: Clinician Overall Satisfaction With Catheter Securement
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Daily up to 7 Days (average 3-7 days of wear)

commonTop: Elevated WBC, No fever, culture negative
